titleStmt.title: Naturall philosophy, or, A description of the world, namely, of angels, of man, of the heauens, of the ayre, of the earth, of the water and of the creatures in the whole world.
Rerum naturalium doctrina methodica. English
titleStmt.author: Scribonius, Wilhelm Adolf, fl. 1576-1583.
Widdowes, Daniel.
Wydowes, I.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.D. for Iohn Bellamie, and are to be sould at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Translated and abridged from the "Rerum naturalium doctrina methodica" of Scribonious by Daniel Widdowes.--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Dedication signed: I. Wydouues alias Woodhouse.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
